greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into distinct parts that are primes or squares of primes.
formula: G.f.: Product_{k>=1} (1 + x^prime(k))*(1 + x^(prime(k)^2)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Dec 26 2016
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if(n < 0, 0, polcoeff( prod(k=1, primepi(n), (1 + x^prime(k)^2 + x*O(x^n)) * (1 + x^prime(k))), n))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Dec 26 2016 */
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 20 2005
